panels.description: CPUs in use by the Cloud hypervisors

targets.query:
bucket = if string(v: "${environment}") == "prod" then "weekly-reporting-bucket" else "weekly-reporting-dev"

data = from(bucket: bucket)
  |> range(start: v.timeRangeStart, stop: v.timeRangeStop)
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_measurement"] == "cpu")
  |> filter(fn: (r) => r["_field"] == "in_use")
  |> aggregateWindow(every: v.windowPeriod, fn: mean, createEmpty: false)

reduced = data
  |> reduce(
      identity: {first: 0.0, last: 0.0, dummy: "join_key"},
      fn: (r, accumulator) => ({
          first: if accumulator.first == 0.0 then r._value else accumulator.first,
          last: r._value,
          dummy: "join_key"
      })
  )

latest = data
  |> last()
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({_value: r._value, dummy: "join_key"})) // Add dummy column for join

joined = join(
  tables: {reduced: reduced, latest: latest},
  on: ["dummy"] // Join on the dummy column
)

joined
  |> map(fn: (r) => ({
      _time: now(),
      Current: r._value,
      "Difference from time range": r.last - r.first
  }))
